questions: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
model_output:
yes The old man is wearing a fabric smock and there are paint splatters around him.
no The young man is wearing wooden-looking goggles, not just any wooden goggles, and his t-shirt appears to be of normal size.
yes The image shows both an old man splattering paint and a young man wearing an oversized t-shirt and goggles, indicating a contrast between them.
yes The smock appears to be made of fabric, as evidenced by its texture and way it holds the paint.
yes The goggles have a distinct wooden appearance in their frame design.
